example.text: Here's a crazy idea: Republicans could stop holding our economy hostage and end this self-inflicted crisis today. [[url]]

I know we'll meet those challenges head-on by working together. Keeping Maryland Strong As we've worked to achieve our year-end priorities, I've partnered with colleagues from both parties to pass legislation that will directly benefit Marylanders everywhere.

Customers shouldn't have to foot the bill for costly, preventable airline delays. Glad to see this move from [[user]] ahead of what promises to be a busy travel season for folks across the country. [[url]]

Let’s be clear: MAGA Republicans are hostage-taking — not negotiating. They’re putting the livelihoods of the American people at risk to enact their extreme agenda, and saying it’s “my way or default.” I am truly worried they will take us over the cliff. [[url]]
Here's a crazy idea: Republicans could stop holding our economy hostage and end this self-inflicted crisis today. [[url]]

The economic damage from a MAGA debt default will be irreparable. House Republicans will have accomplished what Putin and Xi have been striving to do: undermine the $ as the world’s reserve currency. Speaker McCarthy: take your finger off the default detonator!

MAGA extremists are working around the clock to weaken voting rights — writing & passing laws to restrict early & mail-in voting and making it harder for election officials to do their jobs. We can't let up in the fight to pass the John Lewis VRA and the Freedom to Vote Act. [[url]]
